reviewText: Top Gear is a wonderful show...full of adventure and fun!
Have not had the opportunity to watch but I'm sure it will be good
All work in xbox one, haven't tried ps4 but I'm sure that it'll play in it too
I'm sure it's an awesome special as all (UK) Top Gear specials are, however I can't watch it so I have no idea. Tried in 3 different players (Including a PS3) and nothing. Sorry BBC :(
